classly.title: Classly
classly.description: A web app that helps college students quickly find classrooms and lecture halls on campus, complete with interactive maps and real-time directions.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented the interactive campus map UI
Integrated real-time location services for navigation
Collaborated with students to gather building data

resumebinder.title: Resume Binder
resumebinder.description: A platform for companies to collect, organize, and search employee resumes, featuring advanced filtering and PDF export.
responsibilities: Built resume upload and parsing functionality
Developed PDF export and sharing features

clashbuilder.title: Clash Base Builder
clashbuilder.description: A tool for Clash of Clans players to design, test, and share custom base layouts with drag-and-drop functionality and attack simulations.
responsibilities: Enabled sharing and rating of user-created bases
